name: Hyper Tank Gear Z Extended Strike
name_original: Hyper Tank Gear Z Extended Strike
description:
Test your reaction time, aim and courage to face the most powerful division of enemy aviation only with your tank. Now with more planes, tanks, explosions and bombs.

Hyper Tank GearZ: Extended Strike is a hard Shot 'Em Up some times bullet hell. You must fight against huge aircraft fleets and epic bosses.
